Nerangs.ab: ēsm ud bōy ēk tāg abar nihādan hōm pad kamistīh sē tāg ud urwarām pārag-ē nihādan ud hōmāst bun kardan barəsmana paiti.bərəta. ...
"He should put one piece of ēsm and bōy. He has to put in place at least three twigs of hōm and one portion of urwarām and he should begin the Hōmāst. (They should recite) barəsmana paiti.bərəta ..."
hōmāst bun ēsm ud bōy ēk tāg nihādan hōm pad kamistīh sē grih ud wēšistīh wist ud ēk grih ud urwarām pārag-ē nihādan barəsmana paiti.bərəta. ...

"Beginning of the Hōmāst. He should put one piece of ēsm and bōy. He has to put in place at least three knots of hōm and at most twenty-one knots and one portion of urwarām. (They should recite) barəsmana paiti.bərəta ..."
